messages.title: A future fair for all
messages.content: Introducing Stephen Morgan — your local Labour candidate

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will protect key front-line public services, which includes preventing the fall of police numbers in the constituency.
Labour will support the recovery, and they intend to raise family living standards.
Labour will guarantee education or training for all young people up to 18.
Labour proposes to prevent introducing tax cuts for the 3,000 most privileged families in Britain.

issues.economy: Labour will support the recovery, and they intend to raise family living standards.
issues.education: Labour will guarantee education or training for all young people up to 18.

leaflet.personalStatement: I’m Stephen Morgan, Labour’s Parliamentary Candidate for Orpington. My roots are firmly in Orpington—unlike my Tory opponent. I was born at Farnborough Hospital and educated at Hillside Primary School and the Priory Secondary School. I’m very proud of my Orpington background, proud of Labour’s achievements in Orpington, and proud to have been selected by local Labour party members to stand for election to be your MP. Labour is fighting for Britain’s future.

images.caption: Stephen Morgan - Your local Labour candidate

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the choice between Labour and the Tories as one that cannot be clearer, with Labour being presented as the party that will ensure a fair future for all.
